response.overview: Oranges & Lemons is the third in a series of remixed and expanded XTC classics. The album has been mixed for 5.1 Surround Sound from the original multi-track studio master tapes by Steven Wilson with input from Andy Partridge and is fully approved by XTC.  Presented in special packaging with expanded booklet and sleeve notes by Andy Partridge Colin Moulding and Dave Gregory.  - Mixed for 5.1 Surround Sound from the original multi-track master tapes by Steven Wilson - Blu-ray features 5.1 Surround mix in 24-bit/96kHz mixed from the original multi-track tapes - Blu-ray also features a new stereo mix in 24-bit/96kHz LPCM audio
response.title: XTC Oranges & Lemons
